interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Bath Gift Set for Her Blackberry Sage - Organic with Soap Bar, Bubble Bath, Sugar Scrub & Bath Pillow - Top Birthday and Christmas Gift Ideas for Women Review Date: 2016/04/20 Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '12.4 x 9.1 x 8.5 inches; 3.25 Pounds', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '780873595031'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:f7eef1e0d6ac999bf9c0518a71064d21]] This has two of my favorite things, blackberries and organic ingredients!

I'm going to review each product in the set:

Bubble bath: very thin like water. Produced little to no bubbles and what it did produce dissipated quickly. It does smell amazing.
3/5
Sugar scrub: Very moisturizing. Not to oily and not to dry. It has the right amount of oils. It left my skin silky smooth but my bathtub slippery.
4/5
Bath pillow: Very comfortable, had a bit of a strange smell at first I wiped it down with a cleansing wipe. The suction cups do come out but they are easy to reinsert.
4/5
Soap: Medium lathering it does clean well with no yucky residue.
4/5

In all this is a decent set. I would like to see the bubble bath revamped. Then I could justify the price. As is I would not pay asking price as I could buy a better quality set for the same price.

I was offered a discount to review this item. I paid 10$ out of pocket for this item. My reviews are based on quality and preformance and are never manipulated in any way. Review Title: This has two of my favorite things, blackberries and organic ingredients Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals Pure Body Naturals {'Brand': 'Pure Body Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437736398 646437319751'} I'm a bit of a hair product snob. Years of coloring has damaged my hair badly so I am very picky what I use on it.

Not only is this shampoo organic and not loaded with sulfates and parabens but it has an amazing smell. Almost like a sweet cedar.

The shampoo has a medium lather. I used 10 pumps as I have think and mid length hair. I also left the shampoo in my hair for about 2 minutes.

After washing my hair was not greasy or heavy from residue. There was definitely a shine but no oily feel.

I have oily roots and this shampoo cleaned my hair with easy while leaving it evenly moisturizer.

Overall I am very pleased and I definitely will be purchasing again.

I was selected to review this item for free. My review and assessment is my own after personal use and has not been influenced or compensated. profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preference**: The user continues to prioritize organic, sulfate-free, and paraben-free hair care products, showcasing their commitment to natural ingredients and hair health following damage from coloring.

- **Product Characteristics**: They appreciate sweet and unique scents in products, with recent interactions revealing a broader interest in organic items beyond just hair care. Effectiveness in cleaning without leaving heavy residues remains essential.

- **Application Method**: Demonstrating meticulousness in their hair and body care routines, the user is thoughtful about application techniques and product quantities suited for their thick, mid-length hair.

- **Performance Evaluation**: The user seeks a balance between effective cleansing and moisturizing properties, indicating a demand for products that manage oily roots while promoting overall hair and skin health.

- **Repurchase Intent**: Their feedback reflects satisfaction with products, although they remain discerning and price-conscious, showing a willingness to explore alternatives if quality doesn't meet expectations.

- **Overall Sentiment**: The user's interactions highlight a strong appreciation for quality and sensory experiences in personal care, as they continue to seek effective, pleasurable products across different categories, maintaining a discerning approach to both hair and body care.
